intro: Gymnostachyum leptostachyum, commonly known as the slender-stemmed gymnostachyum, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, opposite leaves. It produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers, which are often fragrant. The fruit is a capsule that contains several seeds, typical of many species in the Rubiaceae family.
